title: Minister Lamamra meets with UN Secretary General and his Mauritanian and Portuguese counterparts
text: Following his participation to the 42th session of the AU Executive Council, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra met with the UN Secretary General, Mr. Antonio Guterres, who will take part in the opening of the AU Summit scheduled for 18 February 2023.
On this occasion, the two parties reviewed issues related to cooperation between Algeria and the UN, particularly in the areas of peace and security and the promotion of peaceful solutions to crises.
Furthermore, Mr. Lamamra had a bilateral meeting with his Mauritanian counterpart, Mohamed Salem Ould Marzouk, to discuss the main issues on the agenda of the Executive Council and the AU Summit.

Mr. Lamamra also held bilateral talks with his Portuguese counterpart, Joao Gomes Cravinho based on cooperation relations between the two countries and prospects for their strengthening in the context of preparations for the next bilateral events likely to deepen the ties of friendship and cooperation between Algeria and Portugal, in accordance with the provisions of the Treaty of Friendship, Good Neighborliness and Cooperation that unites the two countries since 2005.
